itemInfo.itemDesc:
A pasta with meat sauce. 

- Unique Effect: Weight Limit +40LT for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Pepper
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Grilled Sausage, Seafood Pasta, Meat Soup, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Pepper Seeds in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Pork
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a pig corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Garlic
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Steak, Steamed Fish, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Garlic Seeds in a Garden.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.
